overview: Savanna loves to fuck and she proves it in B. Skow's new tease-and-please-fest. He captures all of her beauty and all of her insatiable sexuality and lays it bare for all to see. If you're a fan of this Vivid superstar, this is essential viewing. And if you love how B. Skow works a lens around an ass, it's a can't miss!
title: Savanna Samson Stripped
